title: Weird behaviour - Is the network being hacked?
body:
#### System information

Geth version: geth-linux-amd64-1.7.3-4bb3c89d
OS & Version: Linux deb
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour

blockchain updating

#### Actual behaviour

updating hangup on a random block

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

?
